name: Google Analytics Opt-Out Link Shortcode by SICONET
author: SICONET Dominik Rockenschaub

sections.description:
Provide a simple shortcode to display a customizeable Google Analytics Cookie Opt-Out link in WordPress required according to the GDPR.

Usage
[siconet_google_optout_cookie_link title=”Für Google Analytics Opt-Out: Bitte klicken!” gaid=”UA-XXXXX” cssclass=”your-custom-classname” showalertafterclick=”true” alertmsg=”Google Cookies werden nicht mehr gespeichert.”]
sections.installation:
1) Download plugin
2) Install and activate Plugin
3) Use shortcode like in the description
sections.faq: You can find more details at: Plugin Home
sections.changelog: First version of this plugin, provide a simple shortcode
